headline: PHUKET'S BEST TAILOR IN PATONG
paragraphs: With over 25 years of experience in custom tailoring in Patong, No.1 Armani Suits is one of the most trusted tailors in Phuket. We are in the heart of Patong, a short walk from the beach—where craftsmanship meets service. Every garment is a handcrafted piece designed for your body: measured by hand, refined stitch by stitch. Every detail matters.

Looking for a tailor in Patong you can trust? We create custom suits, shirts, dresses and more from the finest fabrics—ready in 2–4 days to fit your holiday. No pressure, no pushy sales. Your suit, your fit. Walk in anytime or contact us on WhatsApp to book a fitting.

We speak Norwegian, Swedish, Danish and English and welcome visitors from around the world. Whether you need a wedding suit, a holiday outfit or a wardrobe you will wear for years—we are here to help.
